name: The Vann Group
overview:
The Vann Group provides outsourced professional services solutions such as accounting/bookkeeping, recruiting social media management and strategic/transactional advisory services that helps small & mid-size businesses create, maximize and realize the unlocked value in their companies.

Vann Group companies include: Client First Associates, an organizational development company; Dufault, Vann & Carella, a corporate accounting and tax firm; Fisher, Tilton & Vann, a strategic advisory services firm; Hire EQ, a recruitment process outsourcing company; Simply Booked, a provider of customized bookkeeping solutions; Social Turbine, a social media management agency; and Split Rock Capital, an intermediary services firm that assists owners of privately held businesses transition their ownership.

The Vann Group is also an affinity partner of the Massachusetts Association of Realtors that provides members with a full suite of succession planning services.
